items.title: Judge Denies Trump Bid to End Protected Status for Haitians as ICE Fears Loom
items.description: Roughly 350,000 Haitians are in the U.S. through legal status granted because of natural disasters and armed conflict in their home country.

items.title: Deadly Errors: Why People Keep Dying Inside Cuyahoga County’s Jail
items.description: Jail administrators fail to fix mistakes that continue to cost lives, an analysis of state records by The Marshall Project - Cleveland shows.

items.title: There’s a Process for Investigating Killings by Federal Officers. Minneapolis Is a ‘Complete Aberration’
items.description: The Trump administration’s efforts to exclude the state from investigations into the killings of Renee Good and Alex Pretti go against decades of prac...

items.title: When Temps Plunge, Dilapidated Jails and Prisons Put Lives at Risk
items.description: The Marshall Project examined reports of scarce food and water and interrupted access to medical care during a day-long power outage in Mississippi.

items.title: ‘Why Is This Happening to Us?’ Daily Number of Kids in ICE Detention Jumps 6x Under Trump
items.description: As the Trump administration detains large numbers of kids, advocates worry ‘it’s only a matter of time before we see a child die.’
